titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Thomas Wentworth, Earl of Stratford, Collection of Prints
Wentworth (Thomas) Earl of Stratford Collection of Prints
titlestmt.author: by Beinecke Staff

publicationstmt.publisher: Beinecke Rare Book and Manuscript Library

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Tuesday January 22, 2019 at 06:57
profiledesc.descrules: translation missing: en.enumerations.resource_finding_aid_description_rules.beinecke manuscript unit archival processing manual

did.unittitle: [Collection of prints, letters, and printed ephemera pertaining to the Earl of Strafford]

repository.corpname: Beinecke Rare Book and Manuscript Library

did.abstract: Includes an original watercolor, 2 Dutch prints, 3 English prints, prints of Charles I (1600-49), Lords and Commons as they appeared at Strafford's trial, and Strafford's execution, facsimiles of autographs, and a contemporary printed copy of "The Earle of Straffords last Speech on the Scaffold."

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: For provenance information, consult the appropriate curator.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Osborn fb145 is the physical property of the Beinecke Rare Book and Manuscript Library, Yale University. Literary rights, including copyright, belong to the authors or their legal heirs and assigns. For further information, consult the appropriate curator.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Thomas Wentworth, Earl of Stratford, Collection of Prints. James Marshall and Marie-Louise Osborn Collection, Beinecke Rare Book and Manuscript Library, Yale University.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: This finding aid was produced from a previously existing list or card set. All pertinent bibliographical information has been retained; the volume may contain additional unlisted material.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The following finding aid is a partial inventory of the contents of Osborn fb145. This list was reformatted from previously existing cataloging.

did.unittitle: Letter to Lord Treasurer Richard Weston, 1st Earl of Portland (1577-1635).

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p:
[1632 Oct 21]
York
30 x 19 cm.
Anonymous MS copy.
"My Lord Since I had the honour to
serve his Majesty Calumny and
Misreport have been my portions..."

did.unittitle: ALS to his (third) wife Elizabeth (Rodes) Wentworth, Countess of Strafford (d. 1688).

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p:
[1632 Oct 30]
York
30 x 20 cm.
"Sweet Hartte I have in little, much
to say to you..."

did.unittitle: CHARLES I, KING OF GREAT BRITAIN, 1600-49
Letter to Thomas Wentworth, 1st Earl of Strafford (1593-1641).

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p:
[1641 Apr 23]
1 p.; 30 x 19 cm.
Anonymous 18th century MS copy.
Assures Strafford that "upon the
word of a King you shall not suffer
in Life, Honour, or fortune."
Docketed by Ralph Thoresby
(1658-1725).
